Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Mount Tamborine, The Escarpment Retreat is in the mountains and close to Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard and Winery and Mount Tamborine Winery. This 5-star condominium resort is within close proximity of Tamborine National Park Witches Falls Section and Tamborine National Park Palm Grove Section.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and private spa tubs. Rooms have private balconies. Kitchenettes are outfitted with refrigerators. Flat-screen televisions and DVD players are available for your entertainment, while iPod docking stations help you enjoy your music in the comfort of your room. Private bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages and facials. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the condominium resort's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center and a library. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
